summary: Birds and Flocks, made compatible with the Hearthfire Expansion
descriptionHtml:
This is the Birds and Flocks Hearthfire Edition.  If you do not own the Hearthfire expansion, do NOT download this file.

If you are switching from the original Birds and Flocks to the Hearthfire Edition, first disable and/or delete the \\\"Birds.esp\\\" mod from Skyrim\\\'s \\\"Data\\\" menu, and then download this file and place it in the \\\"data\\\" folder in the Skyrim directory.

There is no difference between this mod and the original Birds and Flocks except compatibility with Hearthfire.

DESCRIPTION:

This mod will add in dozens and dozens more instances of birds that fly away when startled by either the player or another creature.  The effect is one that already exists in the game but was used very rarely, so I expanded its use. 

This mod also adds in many more circling birds of prey along cliffs, tundras, forests, and mountain ranges.

Now includes more bats in dungeons!

Just download the plugin and place it in your \"data\" folder in Skyrim\'s install directory.

The original Birds and Flocks can be found here:  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11555
author: Kazoomie
